Class ConcurrentLruCache<TKey, TValue>

Concurrent LRU cache with optional TTL. Expired entries are removed on access. Eviction on insert is size-based only (no TTL prune on insert) to minimize churn in hot paths.

| Edit this page View Source

SetMaxSize(int)

Sets the maximum number of entries the cache can hold. If the new size is smaller than the current number of items, least recently used entries are evicted.

Declaration
public void SetMaxSize(int maxSize)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int maxSize

The new cache capacity.
Exceptions
Type Condition
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown when maxSize is less than or equal to zero.
| Edit this page View Source

TryGet(TKey, out TValue)

Attempts to retrieve a value from the cache. If found and not expired the entry is promoted to the most recently used position.

Declaration
public bool TryGet(TKey key, out TValue value)
Parameters
Type Name Description
TKey key

Key of the cached item.
TValue value

When this method returns, contains the cached value if found.
Returns
Type Description
bool

true if the value was found in the cache; otherwise false.
